tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE retirement_accounts ( 
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    account_type VARCHAR(50), 
    account_owner VARCHAR(50), 
    balance DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    last_updated TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE retirement_accounts (
    account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name STRING,
    account_type STRING,
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    balance DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID REFERENCES retirement_accounts(account_id),
    transaction_type STRING,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE account_holders (
    holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    holder_address VARCHAR(255),
    holder_email VARCHAR(100),
    account_id INT
);

ALTER TABLE account_holders
    ADD CONSTRAINT fk_account_id
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id)
    REFERENCES retirement_accounts(account_id);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    account_id INT
);

ALTER TABLE transactions
    ADD CONSTRAINT fk_account_id
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id)
    REFERENCES retirement_accounts(account_id);

CREATE TABLE retirement_accounts (
    account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_holder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    balance DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    last_updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contributions (
    contribution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID NOT NULL,
    contribution_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    contribution_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES retirement_accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE withdrawals (
    withdrawal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID NOT NULL,
    withdrawal_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    withdrawal_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES retirement_accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID NOT NULL,
    investment_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    investment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES retirement_accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
	account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	account_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
	balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
	customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	customer_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
	customer_phone VARCHAR(15),
	customer_address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id INT NOT NULL,
	transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
	amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
	investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id INT NOT NULL,
	investment_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
	investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Retirements (
	retirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id INT NOT NULL,
	retirement_plan VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	retirement_age INT NOT NULL,
	monthly_contribution DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);
